TraitDef.label: Anequinan Desert Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Khajiit comes from the harsh northern deserts and badlands of Anequina, possessing the survival instincts and warrior traditions of the nomadic tribes.

li.label: Desert Nomad
li.description: Born in the harsh deserts of Anequina, this pawn has adapted to survive in the most inhospitable conditions.

TraitDef.label: Anequinan Warrior Code
TraitDef.description: This Khajiit follows the ancient warrior traditions of northern Elsweyr, emphasizing honor, strength, and tribal loyalty.

li.label: Tribal Warrior
li.description: Raised in the warrior traditions of Anequina, this pawn values honor and martial prowess above all.

TraitDef.label: Pellitine River Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Khajiit comes from the lush river valleys and jungles of southern Pellitine, possessing the agricultural knowledge and crafting skills of settled communities.

li.label: River Dweller
li.description: Born along the fertile rivers of Pellitine, this pawn excels in agriculture and craftsmanship.

TraitDef.label: Pellitine Trade Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Khajiit comes from the merchant families of southern Elsweyr, possessing the diplomatic skills and trade knowledge of cosmopolitan communities.

li.label: Urban Merchant
li.description: Raised in the trading cities of Pellitine, this pawn excels in commerce and diplomacy.

TraitDef.label: Khajiit Lunar Awareness
TraitDef.description: This Khajiit possesses an innate awareness of the lunar cycles and their significance, understanding the mystical connection between the moons and their people's nature.

li.label: Moon-blessed
li.description: Born with an innate connection to Jone and Jode, this pawn understands the sacred rhythms of the lunar lattice.

TraitDef.label: Khajiit Moon-sugar Tolerance
TraitDef.description: This Khajiit has developed a refined palate for moon-sugar and its derivatives, able to distinguish quality and resist addiction.

li.label: Sugar Connoisseur
li.description: Born with a natural tolerance for moon-sugar, this pawn can enjoy its benefits while avoiding its dangers.

TraitDef.label: Khajiit Caravan Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Khajiit comes from the great trading caravans that travel the roads of Tamriel, possessing the skills and knowledge of the traveling merchant families.

li.label: Road Walker
li.description: Born into the caravan lifestyle, this pawn knows the roads and trade routes of Tamriel like the back of their paw.

TraitDef.label: Elsweyr Confederacy Loyalty
TraitDef.description: This Khajiit holds strong loyalty to the Elsweyr Confederacy and the ancient traditions that unite all Khajiit peoples.

li.label: Confederate
li.description: Loyal to the Elsweyr Confederacy, this pawn believes in the unity of all Khajiit breeds and clans.
